title: Lights! Camera! Action! Food! The history of food photography from Betty Crocker to Gourmet Magazine
itunes:title: Lights! Camera! Action! Food! The history of food photography from Betty Crocker to Gourmet Magazine
itunes:subtitle: Also on this week's show: Homestyle Cooking from southeast India; the best soup in the world; the truth about drinking and health; and grams versus cups. (Originally aired February 22, 2018.)
description:
Also on this week’s show: Homestyle Cooking from southeast India; the best soup in the world; the truth about drinking and health; and grams versus cups. (Originally aired February 22, 2018.)
